definitions.definition: A crystalline compound C 14 H 22 N 2 O that is used in the form of its hydrochloride as a local anesthetic and as an antiarrhythmic agent.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry , pharmacology ) A crystalline compound C 14 H 22 N 2 O that is used in the form of its hydrochloride as a local anesthetic and as an antiarrhythmic agent.
